title: Part A – moveCandyToFirstRow (4 points)
stimulusHtml:

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • make the comparison inside the loop or at some incorrect point in the code

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to use != MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaaiyiaiabg2da9aaa@31B9@ or equivalent

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Identifies and moves appropriate Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ object to first row if necessary (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • return early, as long as the identify-and-move are inside a loop and would work if the loop got that far

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to replace the moved Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ object with null MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaaeOBaiaabwhacaqGSbGaaeiBaaaa@33D5@

  • move or swap objects when the first row is already occupied

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Returns true MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaaeiDaiaabkhacaqG1bGaaeyzaaaa@33DA@ when non-empty square is identified and false MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaaeOzaiaabggacaqGSbGaae4Caiaabwgaaaa@34A8@ if non-empty square is not identified in the context of a loop (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to replace the moved Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ object with null MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaaeOBaiaabwhacaqGSbGaaeiBaaaa@33D5@ incorrectly identify a non-empty square

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • return early

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is less than or equal to 0.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 3.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 4.

title: Part B – removeNextByFlavor (5 points)
stimulusHtml:

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.A] Calls getFlavor MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3853@ on a Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ object

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • access the element of the candy box incorrectly

  • call getFlavor MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3853@ on the incorrect Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ object

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • call getFlavor MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3853@ on an object of a different type or on the Candy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHXgarmWu51MyVXgarqqtubsr4rNCHbcvPDwzYbGeaGqiFv0Je9sqqrpepiYdbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaabaWaaaGcbaGaae4qaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabMhaaaa@348C@ class
